<a id="VSeparator"></a>

# VSeparator

**Inherits:** [Separator](Separator.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A vertical line used for separating other controls.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A vertical separator used for separating other controls that are arranged **horizontally**. **VSeparator** is purely visual and normally drawn as a [StyleBoxLine](StyleBoxLine.md).
